data.text:
📣 Final Day ‼️

A gift from #ThaiAirways to celebrate our 60th Anniversary: Earn #RoyalOrchidPlus miles x3 per flight on all routes ✨

Book now 👉🏻 https://t.co/bSO0CVFzr6
More info 👉🏻 https://t.co/KdkNnO1Y6r

*Terms and conditions apply. https://t.co/NYagJKq6DK
@helrose_ Greetings. We will reply to you via Direct Message for your inquiry.

@JoachimLindback We would like to inform you that refunds can be made by contacting any THAI ticketing office in your city of departure city at https://t.co/p86rp7UJpR. Please be informed that the possibility of a refund will depend on the terms and conditions of your ticket.
@SophieBrooks17 In this case, we would like to inform you that, if you have booked your ticket through an agency, you have to contact your agency in order to make any alterations to your ticket.
@RonallChersan ทางทีมงานขอขอบพระคุณที่ท่านให้การสนับสนุนเลือกลิ้มลองเมนู Premium จากฝ่ายครัวการบินไทย เราหวังเป็นอย่างยิ่งว่าท่านจะประทับใจอาหารมื้อนี้นะคะ 💜🍽

data.text:
📣 วันสุดท้าย ‼️
รับไมล์สะสม #RoyalOrchidPlus x3 เมื่อสำรองบัตรโดยสารทุกเส้นทางผ่านเว็บไซต์ https://t.co/mWPXQYhi4Q วันที่ 1 - 2 พ.ค. 2563

จองเลย 👉🏻 https://t.co/Y4jZszE8OC
รายละเอียดเพิ่มเติม 👉🏻 https://t.co/5sg3Adz6Iz
สมัครสมาชิกรอยัล ออร์คิด พลัส 👉🏻 https://t.co/yugH09R18V https://t.co/Ox00cdgTmJ

@Anurag_Sarda123 We would like to inform you that refunds can be made by contacting any THAI ticketing office in your city of departure city at https://t.co/p86rp7UJpR. Please be informed that the possibility of a refund will depend on the terms and conditions of your ticket.
@mansoorshoaib Since there are currently many contacts Delaying the response from staff However, the staff will expedite the investigation and contact you shortly. we are sorry for the inconvenience.
@veeru06chem We would like to advise you to delete this tweet as it contains your personal information. We will reply to you via Direct Message.

data.text:
@NgaosriW สวัสดีค่ะ สำหรับการสมัครสมาชิก Royal Orchid Plus ท่านสามารถสมัครสมาชิกทางออนไลน์ได้ที่ https://t.co/HEbbRoe9kx โดยไม่มีค่าใช้จ่ายค่ะ 

ท่านสามารถดาวน์โหลดบัตรสมาชิกแบบดิจิทัลได้ตามรายละเอียดดังภาพด้านล่างค่ะ https://t.co/ibjkNaFDgN

@FeHa Greetings, we are currently experiencing a high volume of requests, and the processing time is estimated to be longer than usual. Please be assured that we will proceed to refund by queue as quickly as possible. We are sorry for the inconvenience.
@janecamilla We are truly sorry for the inconvenience.

@zerozzyzzz Hello, we are currently experiencing a high volume of requests, and the processing time is estimated to be longer than usual. Please be assured that we will proceed to refund as quickly as possible.
@azhc999 Greetings, we will notify of flights resume as soon as there are updates. Please keep abreast of all related news.
@MarcusNoakes Please wait for the reply from our office. They will get back to you as soon as they can.
@janecamilla We are currently experiencing a high volume of requests, and the processing time is estimated to be longer than usual. We are sorry for the inconvenience.
@janecamilla Greetings, a refund will take at least 180 days from the submission of your request.
@MarcusNoakes We would like to suggest that you contact our Thai Airways office in your city of departure at https://t.co/p86rp7UJpR for further information.
@JustDrew_2 You may visit https://t.co/4NxYAGEdNh for options available to you.
@TonsTweetings สวัสดีค่ะ ไม่ทราบว่าท่านทำการจองการเดินทางแบบใดคะ
@ferhatozdemir83 Our ticketing officers will proceed to refund as soon as they can. We do apologize for the inconvenience.
@charnyut ได้ค่ะ
@rohitsbhatnagar Yes, you can.
@ferhatozdemir83 We are sorry for the inconvenience.
@ttheerapy ทีมงานขอขอบพระคุณค่ะ โปรดดูแลสุขภาพและสวมหน้ากากอนามัยและล้างมืออยู่เสมอด้วยนะคะ ด้วยความปรารถนาดีจากทีมงาน THAI Social Media ค่ะ

@ferhatozdemir83 We are currently experiencing a high volume of requests, and the processing time is estimated to be longer than usual. Please be assured that we will contact you as quickly as possible. We are sorry for the inconvenience.
@milajayne All travel must be completed by 31 December 2021 on the same route (s) and the same class of service without the applicable rebooking fee
@MarcusNoakes Greetings, may we inquire whether you had booked your ticket from an Agency or directly with Thai Airways?
@Peter399490011 Please send an email to ropgold@thaiairways.com about this issue.
@milajayne Please visit https://t.co/LxObE9M6y2
@faruk_omar09 Please wait for our official announcement.

"Smooth as silk"
Our Promise over the past 60 years

Thai Airways International has always provided the sincerest, most attentive service since we flew our first flight.

#ThaiAirways #KeepFlying https://t.co/nicWOzGaZ7
@mamsrocshinoda @StephensPhotos We do sorry for the inconvenience.

@OG_Maskedbandit Take care, stay safe, and we’ll see you on board again very soon.
@milajayne Would you mean extending the ticket?
@milajayne What would you mean?
@willysurf Thank you ☺
@HermesInfosoft 💜
@newsroomgirl Thank you, Tanya💜

@rohitsbhatnagar Greetings, if you have THAI ticket (ticket number starting with 217-) originally issued before 25 March 2020 for travel on THAI and/or THAI Smile flights (excluding group tickets), you canrequest a travel voucher for the equal value of the current ticket.

@JoachimLindback We are currently experiencing a high volume of requests, and the processing time is estimated to be longer than usual. Please be assured that we will contact you as quickly as possible. Our apologies in advance.

A million thanks to our passengers for your unfaltering love and support for the past 60 years. We promise to always be by your side and continue improving our products and services in every aspect.

#ThaiAirways #60thAnniversary https://t.co/3TK7OXJh91

@terkser สวัสดีค่ะ เนื่องจากขณะนี้มีผู้ติดต่อเป็นจำนวนมาก ทำให้การตอบกลับจากเจ้าหน้าที่ล่าช้า อย่างไรก็ตามเจ้าหน้าที่จะเร่งดำเนินการตรวจสอบและติดต่อกลับหาท่านโดยเร็ว ทางทีมงานต้องขออภัยในความล่าช้ามา ณ ที่นี้ด้วยนะคะ
